columns.name: BOOKMARK_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bookmark list record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CMT
columns.description: The user-entered comment for each bookmark.

columns.name: ENC_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) for each bookmarked encounter.

columns.name: LETTER_LN
columns.description: The line number in the item for letter status for each bookmarked letter record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note identification number for every bookmarked note.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The order identification number for each bookmarked order.

columns.name: COMPONENT_IDX
columns.description: The index of each bookmarked result component.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The document identification number for every bookmarked piece of media.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The episode identification number for every bookmarked episode.

columns.name: LDA_ID
columns.description: The LDA identification number for each bookmarked LDA (Lines, Drains, and Airways) record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for every bookmarked referral.

columns.name: ADDED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which an item was bookmarked.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_ENC
columns.description: The base Care Everywhere reference ID of each outside encounter that has been bookmarked.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_NOTE_LOCAL_IDENT
columns.description: The locally-assigned unique identifier of the bookmarked external note.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_NOTE_DOCUMENT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the bookmarked note's source DXR contact.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_EPISODE_IDENT
columns.description: The episode ID of the bookmarked external episode.
